attributes.action: apply the 'lower than inflation pay rise' cap to the BBC executives who just got up to 25% p.a. pay rises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How is it fair that local government officers such as myself are having our pay rises capped at 2.5% for the next 3 years in order to control inflation whilst executives at the (publically funded) BBC recieve pay rises of up to 25% in a single year?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
